channel.title: toolsHub.builders - Free AI Tools for Everyone
channel.description: Access 50+ free AI tools for text, images, audio, video, and code. No sign-up required. Instant results.

item.title: toolsHub.builders - 50+ Free AI Tools Directory
item.description: Access 50+ free AI tools for text, images, audio, video, and code. No sign-up required. Instant results. Built for students, creators, and developers.

item.title: All Tools - Complete AI Tools Directory
item.description: Explore our complete collection of free AI tools for text, images, audio, video, and code. No sign-up required. Instant results for students, creators, and developers.

item.title: Tutorials & Guides - Learn How to Use AI Tools
item.description: Step-by-step tutorials to master AI tools. Learn summarization, background removal, code explanation, and more. Beginner-friendly guides with quick results.

item.title: Changelog - Latest Updates and New Features
item.description: Track our progress, new features, and improvements. We ship updates regularly. See what's new in toolsHub.builders.

item.title: Roadmap - What's Coming Next
item.description: Discover what's coming next for toolsHub.builders. See our planned features, upcoming tools, and long-term vision for the free AI tools platform.

item.title: AI Summarizer - Condense Any Text Instantly
item.description: Free AI summarizer to condense long text into clear summaries. Summarize articles, essays, documents up to 10,000 characters. No sign-up required.

item.title: Paraphrasing Tool - Rewrite Text Instantly
item.description: Rewrite and paraphrase text with AI. Create unique content while preserving meaning. Perfect for essays, articles, and creative writing.

item.title: Grammar Checker - Fix Writing Errors Free
item.description: Check grammar, spelling, and punctuation instantly. Get suggestions to improve your writing style and clarity. Works with any English text.

item.title: Text Generator - AI Content Creation
item.description: Generate unique text content with AI. Create articles, social posts, emails, and more. Customizable length and tone. No sign-up required.

item.title: Plagiarism Checker - Detect Duplicate Content
item.description: Check content for originality. Detect potential plagiarism and ensure your writing is unique. Fast and accurate analysis.

item.title: Readability Analyzer - Score Your Text
item.description: Analyze text readability with Flesch-Kincaid and other scores. Improve your content for your target audience. Reading level analysis.

item.title: Background Remover - Remove Image Backgrounds Free
item.description: Remove image backgrounds instantly with AI. Get transparent PNGs without watermarks. Perfect for product photos, portraits, and graphics.

item.title: Image Upscaler - Enhance Image Resolution
item.description: Upscale images up to 4x resolution with AI. Enhance and enlarge photos while maintaining quality. No watermarks or sign-up required.

item.title: Image Compressor - Reduce File Size
item.description: Compress images without quality loss. Reduce file sizes for faster loading. Supports JPG, PNG, WebP formats.

item.title: AI Image Generator - Create Images from Text
item.description: Generate images from text descriptions with AI. Create unique artwork, designs, and visuals. No sign-up or credits required.

item.title: Image Converter - Format Conversion Tool
item.description: Convert images between formats. Convert JPG, PNG, WebP, GIF, and more. Fast and free batch conversion.

item.title: Photo Enhancer - Restore and Improve Photos
item.description: Enhance and restore photos automatically. Improve sharpness, brightness, and clarity. Fix old or low-quality images.

item.title: Text to Speech - Convert Text to Audio
item.description: Convert text to natural speech audio. Choose from multiple voices and languages. Download MP3 files instantly.

item.title: Speech to Text - Transcribe Audio Free
item.description: Convert audio and voice to text with AI. Transcribe recordings, meetings, and videos. Automatic speech recognition.

item.title: Voice Cloner - Clone Voices with AI
item.description: Create AI voice clones from audio samples. Generate speech in any voice. Perfect for content creation and narration.

item.title: Audio Compressor - Reduce Audio File Size
item.description: Compress audio files without quality loss. Reduce MP3, WAV, and other file sizes. Maintain sound quality.

item.title: Noise Remover - Clean Audio Recordings
item.description: Remove background noise from audio. Clean up recordings and podcasts. AI-powered noise reduction for clear audio.

item.title: Audio Converter - Format Conversion
item.description: Convert audio files between formats. MP3, WAV, FLAC, OGG, and more. High-quality batch conversion.

item.title: Video Compressor - Reduce Video File Size
item.description: Compress videos without quality loss. Reduce file sizes for sharing and storage. Supports MP4, MOV, AVI formats.

item.title: Video to Text - Transcribe Videos
item.description: Extract text from videos with AI. Transcribe video content automatically. Get subtitles and transcripts from any video.

item.title: Video Trimmer - Cut and Trim Videos
item.description: Trim and cut videos online. Remove unwanted parts from videos. Easy-to-use timeline editor for precise cuts.

item.title: Video Converter - Format Conversion Tool
item.description: Convert videos between formats. MP4, MOV, AVI, WebM, and more. High-quality video conversion online.

item.title: Thumbnail Generator - Create Video Thumbnails
item.description: Create eye-catching video thumbnails. Generate thumbnails from any video frame. Perfect for YouTube and social media.

item.title: Watermark Remover - Remove Watermarks Free
item.description: Remove watermarks from images and videos. AI-powered watermark removal. Clean visuals without traces.

item.title: Code Explainer - Understand Any Code Instantly
item.description: Get plain English explanations of code in 20+ programming languages. Perfect for learning, debugging, and understanding complex algorithms.

item.title: Code Generator - Generate Code with AI
item.description: Generate code snippets with AI. Support for 20+ programming languages. Describe what you want and get working code.

item.title: Code Formatter - Beautify Your Code
item.description: Format and beautify code automatically. Clean up indentation and spacing. Support for multiple programming languages.

item.title: JSON Validator - Validate and Format JSON
item.description: Validate, format, and debug JSON data. Find errors in JSON structures. Pretty print and minify JSON.

item.title: Regex Tester - Test Regular Expressions
item.description: Test and debug regular expressions. Real-time matching and highlighting. Learn regex with interactive examples.

item.title: Code Converter - Convert Between Languages
item.description: Convert code between programming languages. Translate code snippets easily. Support for major programming languages.

item.title: Text Tools - Summarizer, Grammar, Paraphrasing
item.description: Free AI text tools for summarization, paraphrasing, grammar checking, and text generation. No sign-up required.

item.title: Image Tools - Background Remove, Upscale, Compress
item.description: Free AI image tools for background removal, upscaling, compression, and generation. No watermarks or sign-up.

item.title: Audio Tools - Text to Speech, Voice Clone
item.description: Free AI audio tools for text-to-speech, speech-to-text, voice cloning, and audio processing.

item.title: Video Tools - Compress, Convert, Trim
item.description: Free AI video tools for compression, conversion, trimming, and transcription. Process videos online.

item.title: Code Tools - Explainer, Generator, Formatter
item.description: Free AI code tools for explanation, generation, formatting, and conversion. Support for 20+ languages.
